about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Mohamed Amin Smida — a 22-year-old software developer with a strong passion for building reliable and scalable web applications.

If you're looking for someone who's committed, detail-oriented, and easy to collaborate with — I'd love to help bring your ideas to life.
